mbean:
MPPS Emulator. Use to emulate the generation of MPPS messages for the defined AE titles. org.dcm4chex.archive.dcm.mppsscu.MPPSEmulatorService The default constructor MPPSEmulatorService Define the AE titles of the stations or modalities for which MPPS messages shall be emulated. For each AE title, you must set a minimum delay time between the time the first object of the last series is received and the generation of the MPPS message.
Format:
aeTitle:delay
where
aeTitle = the AE title of the station or modality for which you are emulating MPPS messages
delay = the delay between the time the first object of the last series is received, and the generation of an MPPS message, in seconds (##s) or minutes (##m)
String multiple AE titles together by placing a colon between each aeTitle:delay pair; for example MOD_1:1m:MOD_2:50s StationAETitlesWithDelay java.lang.String Interval for polling for newly received series from the stations or modalities you configured in the StationAETitlesWithDelay attribute. The interval can be specified in seconds (##s) or minutes (##m). NEVER = disable MPPS emulation. PollInterval java.lang.String AE title of the MPPS SCP, to which the emulated MPPS messages shall be sent. CalledAETitle java.lang.String Used internally. Do not modify. MppsScuServiceName javax.management.ObjectName Used internally. Do not modify. MwlScuServiceName javax.management.ObjectName &defaultAttributes; &defaultOperations; Emulate MPPS messages for newly received series from the stations or modalities specified by the StationAETitlesWithDelay attribute. Returns the number of successfully created MPPS instances at the MPPS SCP that you specified with the CalledAETitle property. emulateMPPS int
